channel.title: My animations only set on levelups

item.title: My animations only set on levelups
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

I don’t know why, but for some reason, they do.

For example,

if(fletchingTimer == 0) { //Shortbow (u) fletchingTimer = 2; startAnimation(1248); deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); addItem(50, 1); sendMessage("You carve a shortbow out of the logs."); addSkillXP(35, 9); }

I tried setAnimation as well, but it just doesn’t work. My crafting does the same thing, although I wrote it differently. However, my woodcutting cases are fine (even though they’re not finished):

if(cutTimer == 0) { //stopAnimation(); if(hasAxe() == true) { cutTimer = 3; startAnimation(2846); addItem(1511, 1); addSkillXP(35, 8); sendMessage("You get some logs."); //deleteObject //Timer to replace that } else { sendMessage("You need an axe to cut this tree."); } }

Any ideas? Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: My animations only set on levelups
